Open Alliance for Cloud Adoption

building sustainable open source ecosystems

Get Started
Donate

Producing content and events to help enterprise IT

The Open Alliance for Cloud Adoption is amember-ledconsortium ofglobal IT organizationsdedicated to easing adoption ofinteroperablesolutions and services addressingcloud computingfor enterprises across the globe.

Identify

Identify Enterprise IT requirements for cloud adoption

Develop

Develop guides to help organizations quickly integrate cloud services

Share

Share experiences - good and bad - in walking the path to cloud

What does OACA do?

Usage Guides

We generate Usage Guides to capture common requirements and architectures

White Papers

Our White Papers address issues and surface best practices in a range of domains

Cloud Adoption Stories

Read stories from member companies showing how specific enterprises have adopted cloud services in private, public, and hybrid form.

Cloud Maturity Model

Enabling inter-enterprise benchmarking and enterprise IT self-evaluation.

What can I do?

Be a part of setting the global direction for Enterprise IT cloud adoption

Share

Share your own data center and cloud adoption best practices.

Participate

Participate in OACA Work Groups to create and refine new content

Benefit

Benefit from participation in OACA virtual and in-person events

Lead

Be aleaderin the industry
